mapper.select: SELECT ma.t_message_id,ma.t_message_title,ma.t_message_content,mat.t_messagetype_name,mat.t_messagetype_desc,ma.t_message_begintime,ma.t_message_endtime,ma.t_message_ifpublish,t_userinfo_name,ma.t_message_recordtime,ma.t_userinfo_id,ma.t_messagetype_id FROM t_message as ma JOIN t_messagetype AS mat ON ma.t_messagetype_id=mat.t_messagetype_id JOIN t_userinfo AS ui on ui.t_userinfo_id = ma.t_userinfo_id where t_message_ifpublish not in(2);
